main event: A bright light was observed flashing at irregular intervals in the sky over Skaneateles, New York, and disappeared after approximately 3 seconds.
interesting points: The light was described as brighter than the full moon and illuminated the entire sky when it flashed., The observation lasted for about 3 seconds., Witnesses reported that the object moved rapidly and could not be identified., The colors and shapes of the phenomena resembled typical descriptions of UFOs., Comments suggested it might be a possible aircraft on a night aerial photography mission.
witness description: three civilian observers approached East Lake Road near Skaneateles, NY
